title: Spicer: Transgender bathroom guidelines are 'a states' rights issue' - The Washington Post
text: Spicer: Transgender bathroom guidelines are 'a states' rights issue' Please enable flash to watch this video. Sorry, this video is not available. Your browser does not currently support live streaming video. Play Video Live Video - White House press secretary Sean Spicer said that President Trump's view on transgender student bathroom guidelines, “has been for a long time, that this is not something that the federal government should be involved in, this is a states’ rights issue," during a news briefing on Feb. 21.
